source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenic, tilt-shift video capturing a view of the Grand Canal in Venice. The shot looks down the waterway, flanked by historic buildings, with the focus on the bustling boat traffic. Various boats, including gondolas and water taxis, can be seen moving along the green-tinted water.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenic, tilt-shift video capturing a view of the Grand Canal in Venice. The shot looks down the waterway, flanked by historic buildings, with the focus on the bustling boat traffic. Various boats, including gondolas and water taxis, can be seen moving along the green-tinted water.

bad_caption: A group of cyclists rides along a wide mountain trail, weaving between large pine trees as they descend a gentle slope. In the foreground, a hiker pauses to tie their shoe before continuing up the path. Several birds fly overhead, briefly landing on nearby rocks before taking off again.
